title: Happy with Riot now
body:
>over 1k honors in the old system and no ribbons.
>gets same icon people with 10 honors get
>faq says ribbons were bugged and not working properly
>logs into league
>gets honorable opponent, great teammate and great mentor icon
>happi

replies.body: Hey grats!  Thanks for being a stand up summoner, friend!  <3

I just received the icon with all four icons... and I clearly remember I had the green ribbon at one time yet no green icon :/

A bug? A false promise? Dementia on my part?
